name: Electric Battery
description:
You Charge your internal capacitors by landing hits (M1 / Ranged) to gain buffs.
At 25%: You get a Custom Visual M1.
At 50%: Your M1s now summon lightning on your target and you get 10 additional hearts.
At 75%: You can Use your "Mechanical Construct" Power and your wings Change Color from blue to Turquoise.
At 100% You Can Use your "Lightning Strike" Power and Spark Particles appear around you.
